column4: http://i28.tinypic.com/np0sc6.png can someone help me with that ? I want to be able to connect to the network with the linksys adapter
Uhh, hardware drivers doesn't offer a wifi driver?
do i have to install the linksys wifi drivers in ndiswrapper ?
No worries, uhh. System > Administration > Restricted Drivers.
Check to see if there is Broadcom STA or some sort there.
and in Hardware Drivers it says Broadcom B43 wireless driver is installed
nope, guess i should try that then, be right back :P
good luck =P Should be quick and easy fix =P
thanks, it worked like a charm :)
No thanks necessary =p You did it all ...
